summary: Provides a GeoTIFF raster source built on Rasterio, handling file download, virtual raster (VRT) creation, and CRS transformations for seamless integration into Raster Vision pipelines.
business_intent: Facilitates ingestion and processing of geospatial imagery stored as GeoTIFFs in machineâ€‘learning workflows, supporting remote data retrieval and efficient access via VRTs.
